TunableList.name: associated_buffs
TunableList.description: The associated buffs that will be added to the Sim when the symptom is applied, and removed when the symptom is removed.

TunableList.name: associated_statistics
TunableList.description: The associated stats that will be added to the Sim when the symptom is applied, and removed when the symptom is removed. These are added at the statistic's default value.

Tunable.name: display_name
Tunable.description: The symptom's display name. This string is provided with the owning Sim as its only token.
